title: indicator
description: Indicators contain a pattern that can be used to detect suspicious or malicious cyber activity.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `indicator`.

name.description: The name used to identify the Indicator.

description.description: A description that provides the recipient with context about this Indicator potentially including its purpose and its key characteristics.

indicator_types.description: The values for this property SHOULD come from the indicator-type-ov open vocabulary.

pattern.description: The detection pattern for this Indicator MAY be expressed as a STIX Pattern as specified in section 9 or another appropriate language such as SNORT, YARA, etc.

pattern_type.description: The value for this property SHOULD come from the pattern-type-ov open vocabulary.

pattern_version.description: The version of the pattern language that is used for the data in the pattern property which MUST match the type of pattern data included in the pattern property.

valid_from.description: The time from which this indicator should be considered valuable intelligence.

valid_until.description: The time at which this indicator should no longer be considered valuable intelligence.

kill_chain_phases.description: The list of kill chain phases for which this indicator is used.
